name: Empress
description:
"Explore, fight, and conquer your way across the Mystic Plane!"

Empress is an RPG developed by 8 people in the Unreal Engine that focused on exploration of a Fantasy China setting with turn based combat. A controller is highly recommended for play.

Art Team

Director, Producer, 3D Environmental Artist, 3D Character Artist, Animator, Level Designer, Writer
Trey Atwood

3D Character Artist, 3D Environmental Artist, Level Designer

3D Character Artist, 3D Environmental Artist, Level Designer

3D Environmental Artist, Audio Designer, Audio Engineer, GUI Artist
Kenneth Morrison

Concept Artist, Base Texture Artist, GUI Artist, Particle Effects Artist
Rita Barrueto

Programming Team

Lead Programmer
Anthony Diaz

Jacob Howe

Michael Poole

Download/Play instructions:
  1. Click the download link
  2. Extract the zip file
  3. Double click "BadNeighborhood.exe"
